mapper.select: SELECT P.NO AS PROJECT_NO , C.MAIN_CATEGORY AS CATEGORY_NAME , C.SUB_CATEGORY AS SUBCATEGORY_NAME , M.NAME AS MEMBER_NAME , P.TITLE AS PROJECT_TITLE , P.IMAGE_URL AS PROJECT_IMG , REGEXP_REPLACE(REVERSE(REGEXP_REPLACE(REVERSE(TO_CHAR(P.CURRENT_AMOUNT)), '(\d{3})', '\1,')), '^,', '') AS CURRENT_AMOUNT , REGEXP_REPLACE(REVERSE(REGEXP_REPLACE(REVERSE(TO_CHAR(P.GOAL_AMOUNT)), '(\d{3})', '\1,')), '^,', '') AS GOAL_AMOUNT , TO_CHAR(P.END_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') AS END_DATE , R.NO AS REWARD_NO , REGEXP_REPLACE(REVERSE(REGEXP_REPLACE(REVERSE(TO_CHAR(R.AMOUNT)), '(\d{3})', '\1,')), '^,', '') AS REWARD_AMOUNT , R.NAME AS REWARD_NAME FROM PROJECT P JOIN CATEGORY C ON P.CATEGORY_NO = C.NO JOIN MEMBER M ON P.MEMBER_NO = M.NO JOIN PROJECT_STATUS PS ON P.STATUS_NO = PS.NO JOIN REWARD R ON P.NO = R.PROJECT_NO WHERE P.NO = #{projectNo} AND R.NO = #{rewardNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BACKER WHERE PROJECT_NO = #{projectNo}

SELECT P.NO AS PROJECT_NO , P.MEMBER_NO AS MEMBER_NO , P.TITLE AS PROJECT_TITLE , REGEXP_REPLACE(REVERSE(REGEXP_REPLACE(REVERSE(TO_CHAR(P.CURRENT_AMOUNT)), '(\d{3})', '\1,')), '^,', '') AS CURRENT_AMOUNT , REGEXP_REPLACE(REVERSE(REGEXP_REPLACE(REVERSE(TO_CHAR(P.GOAL_AMOUNT)), '(\d{3})', '\1,')), '^,', '') AS GOAL_AMOUNT , PS.STATUS AS PROJECT_STATUS , C.MAIN_CATEGORY AS CATEGORY_NAME , C.SUB_CATEGORY AS SUBCATEGORY_NAME , B.NO AS BACK_NO , TO_CHAR(B.BACKING_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS BACKING_DATE , TO_CHAR(P.END_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS END_DATE , R.NAME AS REWARD_NAME , R.AMOUNT AS REWARD_AMOUNT , PAY.AMOUNT AS PAYMENT_AMOUNT , PSTAT.PAYMENT_STATUS AS PAYMENT_STATUS , PTYPE.PAYMENT_TYPE AS PAYMENT_TYPE FROM BACKER B JOIN PROJECT P ON B.PROJECT_NO = P.NO JOIN PROJECT_STATUS PS ON P.STATUS_NO = PS.NO JOIN CATEGORY C ON P.CATEGORY_NO = C.NO JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEMBER_NO = M.NO JOIN REWARD R ON B.REWARD_NO = R.NO JOIN PAYMENT PAY ON B.NO = PAY.BACKER_NO JOIN PAYMENT_STATUS PSTAT ON PSTAT.NO = PAY.PAYMENT_STATUS_NO JOIN PAYMENT_TYPE PTYPE ON PTYPE.NO = PAY.PAYMENT_TYPE_NO WHERE B.NO = #{backNo}
